alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Lincoln (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Kennebec County through 500 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Litchfield, or 7 miles west of Gardiner. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Augusta, Gardiner, China, Litchfield, Farmingdale, Manchester, Hallowell, Winthrop, Chelsea, Windsor, Monmouth, West Gardiner, Randolph, Vassalboro and Wales. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 near mile marker 51. Interstate 95 between mile markers 100 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
